### Example 1: The Set-AzConsumptionBudget cmdlet updates a budget in either a subscription or a resource group. (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Set-AzConsumptionBudget -Amount 75 -Category Cost -ContactEmail johndoe@contoso.com,janesmith@contoso.com -EndDate 2017-12-07 -Name PSBudget -NotificationEnabled  -NotificationKey notificationKey-ps1234 -NotificationThreshold 90 -ResourceGroupName MyResourceGroup -StartDate 2017-10-01 -TimeGrain Monthly
```
